titleStmt.title: The portraicture of Roger L'Estrange drawn to the life as it was taken in the Queens Chappel
titleStmt.author: Mowbray, Lawrence.
Prance, Miles, fl. 1678-1689. L'Estrange a papist.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to Laurence Mowbray. cf. BM.
Leaves B2-C2 are reissues of part of Miles Prance's L'Estrange a papist, London, R. Baldwin, 1681.
